subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[palm]] of [[hand]]
# [[sole]] of [[foot]]
# [[shoe]] [[sole]] or [[heel]]
# [[horseshoe]]
# to [[slap]]
# to [[hold]]
# to [[control]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin}} to [[put]] ([[seasoning]])
# {{lb|zh|Sichuanese}} to [[support]]; to [[hold]]
